comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Like Rodriguez, Rabasa, in Elguero was a Mexican representative to the Niagara Falls peace conference in the summer of 1914. See NYT of May 28, 1914. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F60814F93C5E13738... "Connaught honors Peace Delegates."

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Swanq--thanks for connecting this photo of Mexican delegate Elguero to the above photo. As you point out, both images are related to the Niagara Falls peace conference in 1914. We will add some of this information to the description when we update.
